title: Ethereum Cat Herders Meeting #91
body:
## Date and Time

Aug 16, 2022, at 15:00 UTC

## Location 

Zoom: https://us02web.zoom.us/j/84834303064?pwd=YTVDNUxvSjEzL1VTOXNoNmI1a2RlZz09

Video at YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCD9iiIwTRtLDYcEWONs2Q3A


## Agenda

New users on ECH Discord and/or contributor's introduction

### 1. Ethereum network upgrades
- [The Merge](https://ethereumcatherders.com/the_merge/)â€Š
- Goerli-Prater Merge & Mainnet TTD [58750000000000000000000 (tentative)]


### 2. New initiatives
- ECH GitHub backup & YouTube backup
- https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/issues/303

### 3. Events & hackathon
- [Devcon session ideas](https://hackmd.io/-hWk6rw4QYecUZ0MiJML_Q?view)

At [Ethereum.org](https://ethereum.org/en/community/events/)
- [ETHSeoul](https://2022.ethseoul.org/) Aug 05-13, 2022
- [ETHMexico](https://mexico.ethglobal.com/) Aug 19-21, 2022
- [DeFi Security Summit](https://defisecuritysummit.org/) Aug 27-28, 2022 


### 4. ECH updates
- [ECH website](https://www.ethereumcatherders.com/)
   - https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/ech-website-v2/issues/16
   - https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/ech-website-v2/issues/18
   - https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/ech-website-v2/issues/22
   - https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/ech-website-v2/issues/51
   - https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/ech-website-v2/issues/52
   - https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/ech-website-v2/issues/53
   - https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/ech-website-v2/issues/55 (WIP - Image not rendering properly)


- [ECH engineering](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/issues/266) 
  - [EIP bot](https://github.com/ethereum/EIP-Bot/issues) & [EIPV](https://github.com/ethereum/eipv/issues)
  - [Learn2Earn](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/L2E)
- ECH Operations 
   - [ECH Podcast](https://open.spotify.com/show/7dgxKMkSyy3HWtQW7OfqXA)
- [EIPs Insight](https://hackmd.io/@poojaranjan/EthereumImprovementProposalsInsight)
- [PEEPanEIP](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4cwHXAawZxqu0PKKyMzG_3BJV_xZTi1F)  
    - Upcoming meetings can be found on [PEEPanEIP schedule](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/projects/2)

- [Meeting notes](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1axM1KaKc-GCcoPbAnYTOhgLnxXsBVoO5XRjTN3CLnck/edit#gid=0) and action items for ECH 

  - All Core Dev meeting [notes 144](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/pull/595)
  - Consensus meeting notes 93
  - EIP Improvement Process meeting 62
  - Merge Community meeting 6    

**Other community meetings**
  - URL/URI standard working group - [Recording](https://youtu.be/i4gQviIy5ks), [working document](https://hackmd.io/@poojaranjan/URLWorkingGroup)
  - All Wallet Dev meeting # 3 [Recording](https://youtu.be/eLEsq_pvn08)
  - EIP editors apprentice meeting 23 [Recording](https://youtu.be/-g5jeHgRKx0)
  - KZG-Ceremony Breakout Call # 5 [Recording](https://youtu.be/BDPQBVP6XHs)

### 5. Review of outstanding action items from previous ECH meetings
- Meeting [90](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/pull/307)

 Anything else?

#### The date for the next meeting - Aug 30, 2022.
